1582.name: Zirconium Zr 702
1582.Applications: Zirconium Zr 702 is used widely in many industries for process equipment. Major applications include pressure vessels, heat exchangers, piping, tanks, shafts, mixers, and other mechanical equipment; valves; pumps; spargers; trays; and tower packing
1582.Suitable_For: Welding Zirconium alloys in general but also for successfully weld zirconium to titanium, tantalum, niobium (columbium) and vanadium however the weld metal will be stringer and less ductile than the base metals.
